title: What the heck did you guys do
body: So I wanted to ask what the heck is wrong with you people why did you make tanks so god damn busted and nerf adc? What do you expect to kill them with another tank? Or an assasin? This was one of the worst choices you had at buffing and nerfing champs I got banned off the game for supposedly being toxic but in some way I'm actually glad since of the new metta but my question is, why did you decide to bust the hell out of them and nerf what the only thing that could kill them?

replies.body: tanks aren't OP, its like when you see a pro carry with a champ, automatically you feel its OP becuz you feel like your the same skill with the pro saying "whatever he does i can do better", adcs are nerfed becuz they are actually in the OP spot, and you got banned off for "supposedly being toxic" or "i was toxic becuz he said tanks arent op", suck it up and play dota or somethin
I might actually go to another game like HOTS where the community there aren't trash or anything really friendly community unlike league where they all are dumb
Tanks arnet even in an op spot right now... A lucian can easily solokill a tank because the new bork
Is this bad satire? ADCs have been nothing but buffed since they fixed lethality. This is coming from an ADC main too.

http://imgur.com/a/trhPc

is this tank busted? 

i mean he went 7-2-14 41K + damage to champs for most in game
Thanks league community for once again being the most stupid of all ðŸ˜€
